question: The terms Goodput, Throughput and Maximum throughput are most closely associated with which among the following in computers?
explanation: The bit rate is the number of bits that are conveyed or processed per unit of time in computing and telecommunication. For example 1 kbit/s refers to 1000 bits/s while 1MBPS means one million bits per second. One byte per second (1 B/s) corresponds to 8 bit/s.
